tooltip.more_tetra_tools.prototype_weapo: Can be placed in a stonecutter to craft MTT tools
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.amiya_staff.tex:
Provides [Incantation Magic] and [Iron Magic] spell attributes, offering increased magic damage or magic damage lifesteal. Recommended to use with magic modules.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly
tetra/schematic/modular_amiya_staff/core:
Replaces the current core with the Incantation Medic Core. Each time damage is dealt, it will heal the user and players within an 11x11 area.
Healing amount increases based on the material's hardness.

Replaces the current core with the Caster Core, which will increase the player's magic damage.
Magic damage increase amount scales with the material's hardness.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.chainsword.text:
Hold right-click for continuous frontal attacks, dealing high-frequency damage.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/s: Replaces the chainsword's saw with a sharp variant.
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/b: Replaces the chainsword's blade with a basic variant.
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/h: Replaces the chainsword's handle with a variant.
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/g: Replaces the chainsword's guard with a variant.
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/e: Replaces the chainsword's engine with a power engine.
tetra/schematic/modular_mtt_chainsword/s: Applies a socket to the chainsword.
more_tetra_tools.effect.chainsword.name: spinning_sawblade
more_tetra_tools.effect.chainsword.toolt:
Right-clicking the chainsword will cut targets within 3 blocks in front, cutting once every §e%1$s * 0.05§r seconds and consuming 1 durability.
Meaning: Cutting once every §e%1$s tick§r
Increases the frequency of the chainsword's right-click cutting.
more_tetra_tools.effect.saw_severing.too:
When the chainsword performs a right-click cut, it will deal §e%1$s%%§r of attack power as §ephysical damage§r.
Note: Deals at least 1 damage
tetra.stats.more_tetra_tools:saw_severin: Increases the damage of the chainsword's right-click cutting.
more_tetra_tools.effect.iron_spell_casti: Right-clicking while holding the tool allows spellcasting like a staff. The value does not affect the effect.
tetra.stats.more_tetra_tools:iron_spell_: Right-clicking while holding the tool allows spellcasting like a staff
Increases the amount of §e%1$s%%§r §emagic damage§r dealt by the holder. (Can augment Iron Magic spell damage)
§7May not function correctly with damage type conversion enchantments.
more_tetra_tools.effect.incantation_medi:
When the holder deals §emagic damage§r, it will §eheal§r themselves and players within an 11x11 area for §e%1$s%%§r of the damage dealt.
(Includes Iron Magic spell damage)

more_tetra_tools.effect.rapid_slashing.t:
Attacking with full cooldown deals an additional §e%1$s%%§r of §ephysical damage§r to the target and in a 3x3 area; each attack also grants §e1§r level of §eInto the Groove§r, up to level 12.
§eInto the Groove§r: Each level increases attack speed by 8%; upon reaching level 12, tools with the §eRapid Slashing§r enchantment deal an additional §e8%%§r damage.
more_tetra_tools.effect.reap.name: reap
more_tetra_tools.effect.reap.tooltip: Attacking with full cooldown restores §e5%%§r of §elife§r; damage dealt to targets with less than §e50%%§r health is increased by §e%1$s%%§r
Attacks apply a §e%1$s§r level §egrievous_wounds§r effect for 10s.
§eGrievous Wounds§r: Reduces the target's percentage health regeneration by 1% per level
more_tetra_tools.effect.beheading.name: beheading
more_tetra_tools.effect.beheading.toolti: When killing a player/zombie/skeleton/creeper/ender dragon/wither skeleton, there is a §e%1$s%%§r chance to drop the corresponding head.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.low_tide.text:
Attacks reduce the target's health regeneration amount and have a high chance to make the target drop its head.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly

more_tetra_tools.effect.ying_xiao_fleeti:
In normal state, the holder's melee attacks will be converted to §9spell damage§r, and an additional §9spell damage§r equal to §e%1$s%%§r of attack power will be added after each attack.
§4The rage of chaos burns like wildfire consuming decay, the rage of sanity shapes blades that sever hatred.
more_tetra_tools.effect.ying_xiao_shadow:
When right-clicking, if there is an enemy within 3 blocks ahead, deal [9 instances of §9spell damage§r at §e20%% attack power§r and 1 instance of §7true damage§r at §e40%% attack power§r], and enter a 15-second [§4Shadowless Ying Xiao§r] state.
During the [§4Shadowless Ying Xiao§r] state, [Fleeting Night Ying Xiao] is disabled, and the damage dealt by melee attacks is converted to §7true damage§r equal to §e%1$s%%§r of the original damage.
§4To break the endless cycle of hatred, one cannot avoid pain... However, I believe one day, I can put down this sword.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.ying_xiao.text:
Melee attack damage is converted to magic damage and accompanied by additional magic damage chase; right-click to unleash multi-stage slashes on targets ahead, entering a special state where melee attacks deal true damage instead.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly

more_tetra_tools.effect.domain_of_incand:
Melee damage dealt will be converted to §6Ember damage§r, and §6Ember damage§r dealt will be increased by §e%1$s%%§r.
§6I will fight for all that is beautiful in this world
more_tetra_tools.effect.blazing_chariot_:
Right-click consumes §e15% of current health§r to enter the §6Herrscher of Flamescion form§r for 11.5 seconds.
While in Herrscher of Flamescion form, each attack deducts §e5% of current health§r; if the target is afflicted with §4Ember Brand§r, it restores §e%1$s%% health§r per level of §4Ember Brand§r.
§6I can still burn
more_tetra_tools.effect.lone_phoenix_s_p:
During §6Herrscher of Flamescion form§r, for every §e1% reduction in health§r, damage reduction increases by §e0.1*%1$s%%§r, and a level of §4Ember Brand§r is stacked (20s) on those who attack the user.
§6All my fondest memories are here
more_tetra_tools.effect.fiery_hymn_s_ple:
During §6Herrscher of Flamescion form§r, §eattacks§r will stack a level of §4Ember Brand§r (20s) on the target. The user's Ember damage dealt to the target increases by [§e%1$s%%§r * §6Ember Brand level§r].
§6I will burn away this night, letting the light shine into the distance.
more_tetra_tools.effect.the_blade_suprem:
During §6Herrscher of Flamescion form§r, §a second right-click§r will deal §6Ember damage§r to enemies within an 11x11 area, with power equal to [§e%1$s%%§r * §eTarget's §6Ember Brand level§r], and the weapon will enter a 5-second cooldown.
§6With this fire, I will cut through anything!
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.domain_of_incan:
Melee attacks convert to Ember damage, and each attack causes HP fluctuations; right-click to enter a special state, and a second right-click to unleash a powerful attack.

Gain 1 level of §ecoreflame§r when hit or during melee attacks, up to level 15. Upon reaching §ecoreflame§r level 12, you can right-click to consume §ecoreflame§r and enter a special state for [§ecoreflame_level§r-5] seconds: §e[he_who_bears_the_world_must_burn]§r. You will also immediately gain 4 points of §escourge§r. For each §ecoreflame§r level exceeding 12, §escourge§r level increases by 1.
During this state, §ecoreflame§r cannot be stacked. Your §eatk_power§r and §eknockback_resistance§r will increase by §e50%%§r, and your §elife_value§r will increase by §e168.75%%§r.
Upon death or the end of the state, you will deal %1$s%% of your attack power as true damage to entities within a 17x17 area, then exit the state, restoring §e25%%§r of your life value, and removing §escourge§r and §esoulscorch§r effects.
more_tetra_tools.effect.creation_bloodth: During the special state, each melee attack will restore §e%1$s%%§r of your life value and grant you 1 level of §escourge§r, up to level 7.
more_tetra_tools.effect.calamity_soulsco:
During the special state, if you do not attack for 1 second, you will gain the §esoulscorch§r effect. While under §esoulscorch§r, you gain §e%1$s%%§r damage reduction.
Each time you are hit, the level of the §esoulscorch§r buff will increase, causing your next attack to deal an additional amount of physical damage equal to the buff level times §e%1$s%%§r of your attack power.
more_tetra_tools.effect.foundation_stard:
During the special state, if you possess the §escourge§r effect, you can right-click to deal physical damage to entities within a 17x17 area equal to §e%1$s%% attack power§r * §escourge level§r. This consumes up to 4 levels of §escourge§r.
Simultaneously, the special state is extended by 1 second, and you restore §e%1$s%%§r of your life value.
If the consumed §escourge§r level is 4 or higher, an additional 36%% of the damage amount will be dealt as true damage.

Grants the holder a §e15%%§r base chance to §edodge damage§r. Right-clicking the tool enters a 16s cooldown, granting the holder 8s of §eflameheart§r. §r(Damage dodge: sets the numerical value of the damage to zero)
During the §eflameheart§r state, attack speed is increased by 70%%, and flameheart dodge chance is increased by §e%1$s%%§r.
more_tetra_tools.effect.vanguard_swordsm: When the tool's holder triggers §edodge§r, they gain the §evanguard_swordsmanship§r state; the next attack will consume the state and increase damage by §e%1$s%%§r.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.pinus_sylvestri:
Has a chance to dodge attacks (sets the numerical value of the damage to zero). Right-clicking enters a special state with increased dodge chance; after dodging damage, the next attack's damage is increased.

more_tetra_tools.effect.waxing_moon.tool: While holding the tool, gain the §eWaxing Moon§e status up to §eLevel 10§e based on §eyour current health§r, increasing §eattack speed by 13%% per level§r. Reaching maximum level bonus requires losing §e%1$s%%§r of your health, and grants §e25%% damage reduction§e at maximum level.
more_tetra_tools.effect.half_moon.name: half_moon
more_tetra_tools.effect.half_moon.toolti:
Right-click to enter the §eHalf Moon§e state for 13s with a 20s cooldown. During this state, gain a §e%1$s%%§e chance to §edodge§e, and your melee attacks deal an additional instance of physical damage equal to §e2*%1$s%%§e of your original damage. 
§7This dodge can trigger the Red Pine Forest dodge effect.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.decapitator.tex:
Increases attack speed based on lost health, granting damage reduction at maximum. Right-click to enter a special state that adds bonus physical damage to attacks and grants dodge.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly

tooltip.more_tetra_tools.dragon_tear.tex: Can be used as a material to grant the [Undying Blade] trait to tools, or as a consumable item to provide status buffs when holding an Undying Blade.
more_tetra_tools.effect.reviver_killer.t:
Upon hitting a target, grants the §eunrevive§r effect for 10s. During this state, the target's §el totem usage and some resurrection abilities§r are prohibited, and damage dealt to undead and arthropod creatures is increased by §e%1$s%%§r.
§7Some resurrection events are invalid as full compatibility with all mods is not guaranteed. If the Ryland mod is installed, targets will also be granted the [Curse V] effect.
more_tetra_tools.effect.divine_dragon_po:
When the Ender Dragon is killed with the held tool, an additional 4 §edragon_tear§r will drop.
① Dragon Tears can be used as component materials to grant or enhance the §eundying_blade§r trait on tools.
② While holding §eUndying Blade: Tear of the Dragon§r in the §emain hand§r and §edragon_tear§r in the §foff hand§r, right-clicking will consume one dragon tear and grant the §edivine_dragon_power§r and §eunrevive§r status for 20s. During the Divine Dragon Power state, the §eundead/arthropod damage increase§r of the §eundying_blade§r trait is further increased by §e%1$s%%§r.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.mortal_blade.te:
Negative status effects applied upon attacking will prohibit the target's totem of undying usage and some resurrection abilities. Killing the Ender Dragon drops special materials, and damage to undead/arthropods is increased. Special materials can grant other weapons this trait, or be used as a consumable to enter an enhanced state. During this state, damage to undead/arthropods is further increased.
§7Requires modification at the crafting table to function properly

Gains 1%% charge every 0.05 seconds, with a normal cap of 100%%. The next melee attack consumes all charge, increasing the attack damage by an additional amount of §e[Target's Max HP %1$s%%§r*§eCharge Percentage]§r.
§7Non-melee attacks do not consume charge and are not affected by this buff.
more_tetra_tools.effect.chokuhi_kyoshin_:
Right-click to set yourself on fire and enter the 15-second §ePurifying Flame Burn§r status. The tool enters a 10-second cooldown.
While in this status, §eimmune to fire damage§r, and melee attacks will set targets on fire for 10 seconds; additionally, while in this status, §e[Tenka Ichiken]§r deals an additional §e%1$s%%§r damage to §efire-afflicted§r targets, and the charge rate and cap are doubled.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.tenka_ashina.te:

more_tetra_tools.effect.remnant_ash.tool:
If the tool is held upon death, it will be resisted, granting the §eRemnant Ash§r status for §e%1sseconds§r,andthetoolwillentera§es+1 second§r cooldown.
While in the §eRemnant Ash§r status, 1 HP is retained, and HP cannot be regenerated; upon expiration of the status, the §eTwilight§r status is cleared, and the user takes 500%% of their max HP as magic damage.
§eRemnant Ash§7 and §eTwilight§7 statuses will be immediately dispelled, and the user will take 500%% of their max HP as magic damage if no enchantments are present in both main and off-hand.

more_tetra_tools.effect.forfeiture.toolt:
Melee attacks convert to §eelectric damage§r and apply §e%1$s level(s)§r of §e[Numbness]§r and §e[Narukami Divinity]§r status.
§e[Numbness]§r: Each level reduces target's movement speed, armor, armor toughness, and attack speed by 2%%, up to level 40.
§e[Narukami Divinity]§r: Each level increases the amount of electric damage the target takes by 10%%, up to level 30.
more_tetra_tools.effect.narukami_divinit: Right-click to deal §e%1$s%% of attack power§r as §eelectric damage§r to targets in front, putting the tool on a 7-second cooldown; if the target has the §eNumbness§r status, the damage is further increased by §e[Numbness Level / 20]%%§r.

more_tetra_tools.effect.beacon_s_wrath.t:
When the wielder deals §emagic damage§r, there is a §e%1ss%%§r of the damage as magic damage to non-pet entities within a 7x7 area.
(Includes magic damage from Iron Magic spells)
§7Triggers at most once per tick (0.05s).
tetra.stats.more_tetra_tools:beacon_s_wr: When dealing magic damage, has a chance to deal additional area magic damage.
more_tetra_tools.effect.scattering_spark:
Each time the §eBeacon's Wrath§r enchantment fails to trigger, your §eScattering Sparks§r status is increased by 1 level.
§eScattering Sparks§r increases the trigger chance of the next §eBeacon's Wrath§r enchantment by §e%1$s%%§r and is consumed upon triggering.
When dealing §emagic damage§r, applies the §eSurging Current§r status to the target for §e%1$s seconds§r, stacking duration.
While in the §eSurging Current§r status, the damage dealt by the §eBeacon's Wrath enchantment§r is increased by §e[Remaining Status Seconds * 1%%]§r.
more_tetra_tools.effect.crystalline_shin:
When the wielder sneak-right-clicks, they gain §e30 seconds§r of §eCrystalline Shine§r. Non-sneak right-clicks cancel the status. While in the §eCrystalline Shine§r status, movement speed is reduced by 100%%, and simultaneously, magic damage equal to §e%1$s%% of attack power§r is dealt to non-pet entities within a 21x21 area, with Slowness III applied for 0.5 seconds.
§7The initial attack interval is 2 seconds. For every 1 point of attack speed increase, the attack interval decreases by 0.05 seconds, with a minimum interval of 0.05 seconds (1 tick).

more_tetra_tools.effect.dark_whispers_do:
Hold right-click for 1s to gain 1 level of §eDark Erosion§r (15s, max 3 levels), and deal §9magic damage§r and apply §eHemorrhage II§r to entities within a 13x13 area, with damage equal to §e[%1$s%% Attack Power * Dark Erosion Level * 10]§r.
§eHemorrhage§r: Your next instance of damage taken is increased by §e[Base Value * 150%% + Target's 3%% Max HP§r (for §eboss/elite mobs, 1%%)§e]§r and reduces your status level by 1.
§eDark Erosion§r: While active, your §9spell damage§r is increased by §e[%1$s%% * Status Level]§r, and damage taken is increased by §e[%2$s%% * Status Level]§r. Upon expiration, grants 2s of [Darkness + Slowness + Blindness + Hunger + Weakness] equal to the status level, and reduces Dark Erosion by 1 level.

more_tetra_tools.effect.weave.tooltip:

more_tetra_tools.effect.delete.tooltip:
Attacking while §eholding in the main hand and airborne§r puts the tool on a 10s cooldown and applies the §eMind Delete§r status to the target for §e%1$s seconds§r.
§e[Mind Delete]§r: Sets the target entity's movement speed to zero and temporarily disables its AI.
more_tetra_tools.effect.disassemble.name: Disassemble
more_tetra_tools.effect.disassemble.tool: Right-clicking while §eeither tool is held in the off-hand§r removes the target's §eMemory Weaving§r status and puts the tool on a 1s cooldown. If the status is removed, deals physical damage equal to §e%1$s%% Attack Power * Status Level * Remaining Status Seconds§r. If the status is not removed, applies the §eMemory Weaving§r status based on the main hand tool's enchantments.
more_tetra_tools.effect.forget.name: Forget
more_tetra_tools.effect.forget.tooltip: While §eeither tool is held in the off-hand§r, gain §e%1$s%%§r damage reduction. If the §edamage source§r is a §eBOSS/elite mob§r, the reduction amount is doubled.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.mnemonos_graphe: Melee attacks apply special debuffs. While airborne, can temporarily disable target AI. Requires pairing with the Lysis Mython. Can only be used normally after modification on the crafting table.

more_tetra_tools.effect.chrysalid_pyrone: Right-click while §eeither tool is held in the off-hand§r to attack, dealing §e50%% Attack Power§r of §ephysical damage§r and applying §e[Toughness Reduction]§r (cooldown related to current attack speed). Simultaneously, damage reduction increases based on the tool wielder's lost health, reaching §e%2$s%%§r max reduction at §e%1$s%%§r health. (Reduction percentage and health threshold stack when dual-wielding).
Melee attacks stack §e%1$s level§r of §eToughness Reduction§r, and deal extra §e%2$s%%§r damage to enemies under the §eToughness Break§r status.
§7When §eToughness Reduction§7 level reaches 30, it clears the level and puts the enemy into the §eToughness Break§7 status. (For BOSS/elite mobs, this value is 100, break duration is extended, and level is +1).
§7While in Break status, the target loses AI, Attack/Movement/Attack Speed are reduced by 99%%, Armor is reduced by 20%%, and damage taken is increased by [Break Level * 10%%].
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.firefly_sword.t:
Can be held in the off-hand for right-click attacks. While held, grants damage reduction based on lost health. Attacks accumulate [Toughness Reduction]; upon reaching max level, the target enters [Toughness Break] status, losing AI, becoming immobile, gaining defense reduction, and taking increased damage. 
§7Can only be used normally after modification on the crafting table.

more_tetra_tools.effect.ocean_will.toolt: While §eunderwater§r or §ein the rain§r, gain §e%1$s%%§r increased damage and §ereduced damage by half§r.
more_tetra_tools.effect.weak_armor.name: Weak Armor
more_tetra_tools.effect.weak_armor.toolt:
Gain increased damage based on §etarget's armor value§r, with higher increases for lower armor. At §etarget armor below %1$s§r, damage increases by up to §e%2$s%%§r.
§7If the difference from the armor threshold is 3 times, there is no damage increase.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.ocean_s_vengenc:
Gain increased damage and damage reduction in water or rain, and reverse damage increase based on target's armor. 
§7Can only be used normally after modification on the crafting table.

more_tetra_tools.effect.bloom_elysium_of:
Grants §eElysium of the Beyond§r status of §e%1$s level§r to §eplayers§r, §eservants§r, and §eyourself§r within a 25x25 area. 
While under the §eElysium of the Beyond§7 status, entities deal §eStatus Level * 5%%§r more damage and gain 1 level of §eRecollection§r with each attack, up to level 24.
more_tetra_tools.effect.minuet_of_blooms:
When dealing §eprojectile damage§r, you will deal additional frost damage to the target equal to §e%1$s%% of the holder's max HP§r. This damage can additionally gain 1 level of §eRecollection§r. 
While under the §eRipples of Past Reverie§r status, this frost damage will be increased by an additional §e%1$s%%§r of the original §eprojectile damage§r.
more_tetra_tools.effect.verse_zero_vow_i:
The tool wielder absorbs §eStatus Levels§r of §eRecollection§r from entities within a 25x25 area. When the wielder's §eRecollection§r reaches level 24, the status is cleared, and they enter a §e%1$s§r level §eRipples of Past Reverie§r state for §e13 seconds§r. 
While in this state, entities gain §e[Status Level * 11.3%%]§r health. Additionally, for every level of §eRecollection§r gained by entities within a 25x25 area (including yourself), the duration of the §eRipples of Past Reverie§r state is §eextended by 1s§r.
more_tetra_tools.effect.this_ode_to_all_:
While under the §eRipples of Past Reverie§r state, §eplayers§r and §eservants§r within a 25x25 area continuously gain the §e%1$s level§r status of §eThe Ode of Amphoreus§r. 
Under the §eThe Ode of Amphoreus§r status, entities deal §e[Status Level * 13%%]§r more damage.
more_tetra_tools.effect.amphoreus_saga_o:
For individuals wielding the special tool, §eThe Ode of Amphoreus§r grants special effects. 
§eSolar Flare§r: The original 7s special status will continuously refresh during §eThe Ode of Amphoreus§r until §eThe Ode of Amphoreus§r ends.

more_tetra_tools.effect.gekka.name: Gekka
more_tetra_tools.effect.gekka.tooltip:
When dealing damage to enemies, applies §e%1$s level§r of §eSetsugetsuka§r status for 10s. Repeated applications do not refresh the duration. 
After the §eSetsugetsuka§r status ends, it will deal §e[Status Level * 3]§r frost damage to the target. 
§7To prevent this damage from causing no drops, if there are player units within 25x25 nearby during the Setsugetsuka status, they will be designated as the final killer to ensure normal drops. If no players are present, it will look for other servant entities within 25x25.
tooltip.more_tetra_tools.setsugetsu_kata:
